thread.title: New Street archive: The changes to ticket offices
thread.title_full: New Street archive: The changes to ticket offices | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: New Street archive: The changes to ticket offices
text:
With the new Birmingham New Street having such up-to-date technology, it is quite a contrast to look back into the archives to see how it was before.
When the previous station opened in the 1960s, ATV produced a documentary looking at the developments, highlighting the modern qualities to ticket offices such as being fully automated, printing tickets to any destination while passengers waited.
Play video Below are the ticket machines that came into use in April 2013, when the new concourse of Phase One of the latest development opened to the public. Rather different to those in use in 1967...
The machines now accept notes, coins and card payment Credit: ITV News Central Last updated Mon 21 Sep 2015 Read more 35 updates Birmingham New Street's grand opening Travel Birmingham Birmingham New Street
